subject: Re: Website - Gallery Update - ARABESCATO BORGHINI™ 9500

full_threads.body:
Hello Tien.

I have recorded a video walkthrough on how to edit gallery pages.

I looked into the possibility of adding hyperlinks, and while there is an option to do so, it applies to the entire image group rather than individual images. This means that if we add a link in this section, all images will share the same link.

Let me know if there is anything else that you need. Thank you!

Regards,
Cindy

Hi team - looks like a lot of passing around on this ticket.

Passing this to @cindy to record quick video this morning and close. pray🙏

@glen could yo please create a loom video on how to do the steps provided? Thanks!

Hi Tien,

Here's the steps on how you can manage the Galleries:

Step 1: Access the Page with the Gallery

  • In the left menu, click Pages
  • Hover over the desired page and click Edit with Elementor

Step 2: Locate the Gallery Widget

  • Scroll through the page or use the Navigator (right-click on an element > “Navigator”) to find the Gallery widget

Step 3: Open the Gallery Settings

  • Click directly on the Gallery widget
  • In the left panel, click the “Edit Gallery” button (under the Content tab)

Step 4: Add New Images

  • Click “Add to Gallery”
  • Upload images:
    • Click “Upload Files”
    • Drag images or click “Select Files” to upload from your device
  • Select the new images and click “Add to Gallery”

Step 6: Reorder or Remove Images

  • Drag images to reorder
  • Click the ‘X’ to remove an image

Step 7: Update the Page

  • Click the pink “Publish” button (top right) to save changes

We will create a recording as well and will send it to you once done.

(Time: 10mins) @ricaR

Step 1: Access the Page with the Gallery

  • In the left menu, click Pages
  • Hover over the desired page and click Edit with Elementor

Step 2: Locate the Gallery Widget

  • Scroll through the page or use the Navigator (right-click on an element > “Navigator”) to find the Gallery widget

Step 3: Open the Gallery Settings

  • Click directly on the Gallery widget
  • In the left panel, click the “Edit Gallery” button (under the Content tab)

Step 4: Add New Images

  • Click “Add to Gallery”
    Upload images:
    • Click “Upload Files”
    • Drag images or click “Select Files” to upload from your device
  • Select the new images and click “Add to Gallery”

Step 6: Reorder or Remove Images

  • Drag images to reorder
  • Click the ‘X’ to remove an image

Step 7: Update the Page

  • Click the pink “Publish” button (top right) to save changes
